name: Home Alone (itch) (DSB)
description:
Are you home alone?

You wake up to a...something. You aren't quite sure.

But you explore.

And discover someone somwhere they don't belong.

"Home Alone" is a horror interactive fiction game that takes you into the depths of a troubled person. This game does feature course language and some triggering factors such as mental health and death.

This is also my first ever Interactive Fiction game - feedback is welcome! Hope you enjoy :)
